bool '''CheckLocalView'''([int ''consoleplayer''])
== Usage == Checks to see if the Actor is the local view point of the player.
=== Parameters === *''consoleplayer'' - Default is -1. Unused and kept for backwards compatibility.
=== Return value === Returns true if the Actor is either the view point of the player or is the player itself when looking through a non-monster camera.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
